com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Interface SpenControlListener


  • public interface SpenControlListener
    The listener interface for callbacks that are called about the state of control on view.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PRESS_TYPE_LONG_PRESS
      Long press.
      static int PRESS_TYPE_NONE
      No press.
      static int PRESS_TYPE_TAP
      Tapping on the view.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onClosed(ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> objectList)
      This handler is called when control is closed
      boolean onCreated(ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> objectList, ArrayList<Rect> relativeRectList, ArrayList<SpenContextMenuItemInfo> menu, ArrayList<Integer> styleList, int pressType, PointF point)
      This handler is called when control is created.
      boolean onMenuSelected(ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> objectList, int itemId)
      This handler is called when context menu is selected in control.
      void onObjectChanged(ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> objectList)
      this is called, when object position, size, rotation is changed.
      void onRectChanged(RectF rect, SpenObjectBase object)
      this is called, when object rect is changed.
      void onRotationChanged(float angle, SpenObjectBase objectBase)
      this is called, when object rotation is changed.

    • Field Detail

      • PRESS_TYPE_NONE

        static final int PRESS_TYPE_NONE
        No press.
        See Also:

      • PRESS_TYPE_TAP

        static final int PRESS_TYPE_TAP
        Tapping on the view.
        See Also:

      • PRESS_TYPE_LONG_PRESS

        static final int PRESS_TYPE_LONG_PRESS
        Long press.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • onClosed

        boolean onClosed(ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> objectList)
        This handler is called when control is closed

      • onCreated

        boolean onCreated(ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> objectList,
                ArrayList<Rect> relativeRectList,
                ArrayList<SpenContextMenuItemInfo> menu,
                ArrayList<Integer> styleList,
                int pressType,
                PointF point)
        This handler is called when control is created.

      • onObjectChanged

        void onObjectChanged(ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> objectList)
        this is called, when object position, size, rotation is changed.

      • onRectChanged

        void onRectChanged(RectF rect,
                 SpenObjectBase object)
        this is called, when object rect is changed. Remarks : onObjectChanged is called when touch action is finished. but onRectChanged is called in the middle of touch action.
        Parameters:
        rect - rect of object
        object - object that is set to control

      • onRotationChanged

        void onRotationChanged(float angle,
                     SpenObjectBase objectBase)
        this is called, when object rotation is changed. Remarks : onObjectChanged is called when touch action is finished. but onRotationChanged is called in the middle of touch action.
        Parameters:
        angle - rotation angle
        objectBase - object that is set to control

      • onMenuSelected

        boolean onMenuSelected(ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> objectList,
                     int itemId)
        This handler is called when context menu is selected in control.
        Parameters:
        objectList - list of object
        itemId - id of item
